issue.title: [Python] Output a representation of pyarrow.Schema that can be used to reconstruct a schema in a script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3730](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3730). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would be like what `__repr__` is used for in many built-in Python types, or a schema as a list of tuples that can be passed to `pyarrow.schema`
